name: Chongqing Chicken
description: Stir-fried dish, which consists of marinated then deep-fried pieces of chicken, dried Sichuan chilli peppers, spicy bean paste, Sichuan peppers, garlic, and ginger.

name: Kung Pao Chicken(spicy)
description: A spicy, stir-fried Chinese dish made with cubes of chicken, peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers.

name: General Tso's Chicken ( spicy )
description: A sweet and spicy deep-fried chicken dish that is served in North American Chinese restaurants.

name: Sesame Chicken
description: Fried chicken served with a combination of honey, ketchup, soy sauce, garlic and sesame oil.

name: Roasted Duck . Half ( with bone )
description: Duck roasted with root vegetables, sweet potatoes, a delicious sauce like orange sauce, cranberry sauce or red currant gravy

name: Peking Duck ( 24 hours advance request )
description: Duck meat characterized by its thin, crispy skin, with authentic versions of the dish serving mostly the skin and little meat, sliced in front of the diners by the cook.

name: Chicken with cashew nuts
description: Chicken finished with roasted cashew and soy sauce, honey, rice wine vinegar, ginger, and Asian chili garlic sauce.
